title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
description: When using the new class wizard, the 'Enclosing Type' field is not filled with the current type in the editor for nested classes.
OB: When clicking the new class button and checking 'Enclosing Type', the field is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field.
